message: Only 8 years. We still have a lot of work to do in raising awareness about not only sex trafficking but labor trafficking as well.

data.description: Efren Alvarez, 53, was convicted of one felony count of human labor trafficking and three felony counts of extortion in August and faced up to 15 years in prison.
data.title: Man Enslaved 3 Immigrant Women, Treated Them Like ‘Animals’, Gets 8-Year Sentence
